content.prompt: The author writes approvingly of the cultured woman’s restraint in quoting poetry and Latin authors (paragraph 3, sentence 4) because

choices.label: the author respects the woman’s desire to conform to received notions of feminine modesty
the author endorses the woman’s decision to tolerate male prejudices against educated women
it reveals the woman’s thoughtful consideration of the effects of her own behavior on others
it suggests that the woman has wisely devoted more time to studying modern languages than to studying classical literature

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
